text: A tui that can scrape and manage performance-counters with a focus on declarative code-search. It aligns to the security theme; touching code-search, declarative, tui.
examples: Ship a tiny declarative code-search tui prototype end-to-end (README + demo)
Integrate declarative code-search tui into an existing repo and add basic metrics
Instrument declarative code-search tui and capture before/after results for one workflow
